entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:43 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
